name: My Little Pony Multimedia Fusion
description: WOW! This is my last My Little Pony fangame. It's called My Little Pony Multimedia Fusion. It's made with Mario Forever Engine. It's made by MajorGeniePonyGirl. Give Credits to Me, Yagoshi and Others. My Little Pony and Mickey Mouse and Others belongs to Hasbro, Disney, Nintendo and Others.
